greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of rooted labeled trees with n nodes and height <= k, for n >= 1, 0 <= k <= n-1.
comment: If we replace each row by its differences we get A034855.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..100, flattened
J. Riordan, Enumeration of trees by height and diameter, IBM J. Res. Dev. 4 (1960), 473-478. [broken link]
J. Riordan, Enumeration of trees by height and diameter, IBM J. Res. Dev. 4 (1960), 473-478.
maple: gf:= proc(k) gf(k):= `if`(k=0, x, x*exp(gf(k-1))) end:
A:= proc(n, k) A(n, k):= n!*coeff(series(gf(k), x, n+1), x, n) end:
mathematica: gf[k_] := gf[k] = If[k == 0, x, x*E^gf[k-1]]; a[n_, k_] := n!*Coefficient[Series[gf[k], {x, 0, n+1}], x, n]; Table[Table[a[n, d], {d, 0, n-1}], {n, 1, 12}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 07 2014, after Maple *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 28 2014
